ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Hangouts for teens
ygData.msgSnippet: Tuldayen Grimblade Has a great point here. See, I spend way to much time soloing. Well at least with Durgaa, she s kind of a lone wolf as it is. (it s a ranger
ygData.messageBody:
Tuldayen Grimblade Has a great point here. See, I spend way to much time
soloing. Well at least with Durgaa, she's kind of a lone wolf as it is.
(it's a ranger thing LOL!)

I try to group with my others though, especially my Druid. Group skill are
pretty important, I've been in several "groups" that have just been all over
the place and ended up getting creamed by pretty easy mobs for that group.
It's mostly due to the group consisting of mostly tanks or casters. The
Tanks usually end up running all over the place and the casters usually end
up running all over the place trying to stay alive. I usually try to form
groups and specify that I need a little of all classes. It's tough forming
them but usually pays off once I get them formed.

Later!
